title: Lt. General Nadeem posted as new DG ISI: ISPR
content:
RAWALPINDI, Oct 6 (APP):As part of the routine appointments and transfers in the Pakistan Army, Lieutenant General Nadeem Ahmed Anjum was posted as Director General Inter Services Intelligence (DG ISI).
Lieutenant General Muhammad Saeed was appointed Corps Commander Karachi, said an Inter Services Public Relations (ISPR) media release.
It added that Lieutenant General Noman Mahmood was appointed President National Defense University. Moreover, Major General Asim Malik was promoted to the rank of Lieutenant General.
Lieutenant General Asim Malik was appointed as Adjutant General of Pakistan Army.
